[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@yext/pages](./pages.md) &gt; [Tag](./pages.tag.md)

## Tag interface

Interface for an HTML tag. Can set attributes on the tag, but if a body needs to be defined, use the other field of the [HeadConfig](./pages.headconfig.md) interface.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Tag
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[attributes](./pages.tag.attributes.md)

</td><td>

</td><td>

[Attributes](./pages.attributes.md)

</td><td>

The attributes to add to the element. Each attribute will be added in the form 'key="value"' and attributes will be seperated by a space

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[type](./pages.tag.type.md)

</td><td>

</td><td>

[TagType](./pages.tagtype.md)

</td><td>

The type of the element to create (i.e. meta, script, link, etc.)

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
